A harvest festival, Makar Sankranti is celebrated across India in different names. The sun God is worshipped on this day and is offered newly harvested grains. It is also a day to wish family and friends and people often come together to celebrate.

description: Amazon is now closely monitoring office attendance, tracking not just presence but also exact hours spent by corporate employees. This escalation in surveillance, revealed by an internal document, flags 'Low-Time Badgers' and 'Zero Badgers' who don't meet in-office expectations. The move follows a strict five-day return-to-office mandate, with similar tracking systems emerging at tech rivals like Samsung and Dell.

description: The US has presented President Trump with expanded military, cyber, and psychological operation options to attack Iran amidst nationwide protests. Potential targets include nuclear and missile sites, with cyber and psychological campaigns aimed at disrupting command structures and state media. While diplomacy remains the first option, the US is escalating pressure through tariffs and considering internet access for citizens.

title: Erika Kirk faces backlash for attending Peach Bowl alone as fans debate parenting
description: Erika Kirk faced online criticism after attending the Peach Bowl in Atlanta without her children on January 10, 2025. Social media users questioned her choices following the death of her husband, Charlie Kirk. While many criticized her parenting, others defended her, saying grief is personal. Erika has not responded to the backlash.

title: Justin Rose and Kate Phillips net worth timeline from 2016 to 2026
description: Justin Rose and his wife Kate Phillips have built a combined net worth estimated at $50–$60 million by 2026, driven by Rose’s sustained PGA Tour success, endorsements, and long-term investments. Their wealth has grown steadily over a decade, reflecting consistent performance, careful financial planning, and ongoing involvement in business and philanthropy.

title: Vanessa Bryant recalls Kobe Bryant’s iconic footwork vs Charlotte Hornets
description: Vanessa Bryant continues to honor her late husband, Kobe Bryant, by sharing cherished memories. Recently, she posted a throwback clip of Kobe's incredible 2008 dunk against the Charlotte Hornets, highlighting his 'Mamba Mentality.'  She also expressed gratitude on behalf of the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation for the support enabling opportunities for young athletes.

title: Mike Tomlin net worth: Steelers coach salary, contracts, and earnings
description: Mike Tomlin's consistent success with the Pittsburgh Steelers since 2007 has solidified his net worth at an estimated $30 million by 2025. His recent three-year contract extension, valued at approximately $50 million through the 2027 season, makes him one of the NFL's highest-paid coaches. This long-term commitment underscores the team's unwavering trust in his leadership.
